TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiscoveryClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpWebClientProtocol

summary.span: 提供支援，以程式設計方式叫用 (Invoke) XML Web Service 探索 (Discovery)。

span.span: Provides support for programmatically invoking XML Web services discovery.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web 服務探索處理程序尋找，或探索、 一個或更多相關文件，描述可用的 XML Web 服務。XML Web service discovery is the process of locating, or discovering, one or more related documents that describe available XML Web services. 它是透過 XML Web 服務用戶端了解有關使用 XML Web 服務在指定的 URL 和使用方式的 XML Web 服務探索。It is through XML Web services discovery that XML Web service clients learn about the available XML Web services at a given URL and how to use them. XML Web 服務探索的運作方式，從您已取得 URL 探索文件，可能是透過目錄服務，例如內部部署http://uddi.microsoft.com，不過，您並沒有提供的 XML Web 服務的相關詳細資料。XML Web services discovery works from the premise that you have already obtained the URL to a discovery document, possibly through a directory service, such as http://uddi.microsoft.com, however, you do not have the details about the XML Web services offered. 透過 XML Web 服務探索，您可以探索中所列的 XML Web 服務的詳細在特定的 URL。Through XML Web services discovery, you can discover the details about the XML Web services listed in a at a specific URL. XML Web 服務用戶端會從 XML Web 服務探索提供的 URL 設為 或方法。An XML Web service client starts XML Web services discovery by supplying a URL to either the or methods. 通常，此 URL 是指探索文件，依次指向描述一或多個 XML Web 服務加入至文件屬性。Typically, this URL refers to a discovery document, which in turn refers to documents that describe one or more XML Web services, which are added to the property. 此時，只有該文件會下載並驗證以指向有效 XML Web 服務的相關資訊。At that point, only that document is downloaded and verified to point to valid information about XML Web services. 不過，在這個階段未驗證該文件中包含的參考。However, the references contained in that document are not verified at this stage. 改為加入至屬性。Instead they are added to the property. 若要確認的參考都是有效，叫用或方法新增至有效的參考文件屬性。To verify that the references are valid, invoke the or methods, which add valid referenced documents to the property. 最後，如果用戶端想要儲存到磁碟，請叫用的探索結果方法。Last, if a client wants to save the discovery results to disk, invoke the method. 如果不需要以程式設計方式存取 XML Web 服務探索，[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]隨附探索命令提示字元中的 XML Web service 的 Web 服務探索工具 (Disco.exe)。If programmatic access to XML Web services discovery is not needed, the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)] ships the Web Services Discovery tool (Disco.exe) for discovering XML Web services within a command prompt. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 服務探索工具 (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979)。For more details, see [Web Services Discovery Tool (Disco.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/acd88078-c581-42bc-94ca-6633e2851979). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 Web Form類別中的其他類別以及命名空間，以程式設計方式叫用 XML Web 服務探索。The following code example is a Web Form demonstrating how to use the class together with the other classes in the namespace to programmatically invoke XML Web services discovery. 程式碼範例示範如何使用， ， ， ， ，和方法。The code example demonstrates using the , , , , , and methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

public: property System::Collections::IList ^ AdditionalInformation { System::Collections::IList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得在探索文件中找到的參考以外的資訊。

span.span: Gets information in addition to references found in the discovery document.

value.span: ，包含在探索文件中找到的額外資訊。

span.span: An containing additional information found in the discovery document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性主要是包含 SOAP 繫結，由探索文件中定義的類別。The property primarily contains SOAP bindings, represented by the class, defined in the discovery document. ## Examples [!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/CPP/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/CS/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_AdditionalInformation/VB/discoveryclientprotocol_additionalinformation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument Discover(string url) cil managed
Public Function Discover (url As String) As DiscoveryDocument

param.name: url
param.span: URL，XML Web Service 探索在此處開始。

span.span: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.

summary.span: 探索提供的 URL 以判斷它是否是探索文件。

span.span: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document.

returns.span: ，包含在所提供的 URL 處的 XML Web Service 探索結果。

span.span: A containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法預期所提供的 URL 是探索文件。The method expects that the supplied URL is a discovery document. 如果 URL 是指服務說明或 XML 結構描述會擲回例外狀況。If the URL refers to a service description or an XML schema an exception is thrown. 若要探索的 XML 結構描述或服務描述叫用方法。To discover an XML schema or a service description invoke the method. 如果提供的 URL 指向有效的探索文件，加入探索文件所提供的 URL 在和集合。If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the and collection. 此外，探索文件中的參考會加入集合，但不是驗證以指向有效的探索文件。Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents. 若要確認的參考，指向有效的探索文件叫用或方法。To verify the references, point to valid discovery documents to invoke the or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是 Web 表單，會填入中的文件的相關詳細資料屬性參考搭配 XML Web 服務探索期間找到每份文件。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填滿的結果與引動過程後面呼叫。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Discover/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 存取提供的 URL 已經傳回 HTTP 狀態碼，而不是傳回 。

span.span: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than .

exception.span: 參數是有效的 URL，但是沒有指向有效的探索文件。

span.span: The parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocument DiscoverAny(string url) cil managed
Public Function DiscoverAny (url As String) As DiscoveryDocument

param.name: url
param.span: URL，XML Web Service 探索在此處開始。

span.span: The URL where XML Web services discovery begins.

summary.span: 探索提供的 URL 以判斷它是否為探索文件、服務描述或 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 結構描述。

span.span: Discovers the supplied URL to determine if it is a discovery document, service description or an XML Schema Definition (XSD) schema.

returns.span: ，包含在所提供的 URL 處的 XML Web Service 探索結果。

span.span: A containing the results of XML Web services discovery at the supplied URL.

returns.span: 如果 參數參考服務描述或 XSD 結構描述，則會為該參數在記憶體中建立 。

span.span: If the parameter refers to a service description or an XSD Schema, a is created in memory for it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會探索所提供的 URL 是探索文件中，服務說明或 XSD 結構描述。The method discovers whether the supplied URL is a discovery document, service description or XSD schema. 如果已知 URL 只會參考探索文件可能叫用方法。If it is known that the URL only refers to a discovery document, the method might be invoked. 如果提供的 URL 會指向有效的探索文件、 XSD 結構描述或服務描述，加入探索文件所提供的 URL 在和集合。If the supplied URL points to a valid discovery document, XSD schema, or service description, the discovery document at the supplied URL is added to the and collections. 當提供的 URL 參考到 XSD 結構描述或服務描述會在記憶體中建立並新增至和集合。When the supplied URL refers to an XSD schema or Service Description a is created in memory and added to the and collections. 此外，探索文件中的參考會加入集合，但不是驗證以指向有效的探索文件。Additionally, references within the discovery document are added to the collection, but not verified to point to valid discovery documents. 若要確認參考都指向有效的探索文件，叫用或方法。To verify that references point to valid discovery documents, invoke the or methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是 Web 表單，會填入中的文件的相關詳細資料屬性參考搭配 XML Web 服務探索期間找到每份文件。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填滿的結果與引動過程後面呼叫。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoverAny/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 存取提供的 URL 已經傳回 HTTP 狀態碼，而不是傳回 。

span.span: Accessing the supplied URL returned an HTTP status code other than .

exception.span: 參數是有效的 URL，但是沒有指向有效的探索文件、服務描述或 XSD 結構描述。

span.span: The parameteris a valid URL, but does not point to a valid discovery document, service description, or XSD schema.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Documents As DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection

span.span: Gets a collection of discovery documents.
A representing the collection of discovery documents found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間叫用會填入集合， ，和方法。The collection is populated during invocations to the , , and methods. 在叫用期間和方法，如果所提供的 URL 是有效的探索文件，該文件會加入至集合。During invocations to the and methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the collection. 在叫用期間和方法中參考有效的探索文件集合會加入至集合。During invocations to the and methods, valid discovery document references in the collection are added to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是 Web 表單，會填入中的文件的相關詳細資料XML Web 服務探索期間探索到的屬性。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property discovered during XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填滿的結果與引動過程後面呼叫。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合會填入叫用期間發生的例外狀況， ， ，和方法。The collection is populated with exceptions that occurred during invocations to the , , , and methods. 這些方法的引動過程上被清除。The is cleared on invocation of these methods. ## Examples [!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientProtocol_Errors#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_Errors/CPP/discoveryclientprotocol_errors.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol_Errors#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_Errors/CS/discoveryclientprotocol_errors.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol_Errors#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol_Errors/VB/discoveryclientprotocol_errors.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection ReadAll(string topLevelFilename) cil managed
Public Function ReadAll (topLevelFilename As String) As DiscoveryClientResultCollection

param.name: topLevelFilename
param.span: 要讀取的檔案名稱，包含已儲存探索文件的對應。

span.span: Name of file to read in, containing the map of saved discovery documents.

summary.span: 讀取包含已儲存探索文件對應的檔案，此文件填入 和 屬性，並且在檔案中具有所參考的探索文件、XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 結構描述和服務描述。

span.span: Reads in a file containing a map of saved discovery documents populating the and properties, with discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions referenced in the file.

returns.span: ，包含在已儲存的探索文件對應檔案中找到的結果。

span.span: A containing the results found in the file with the map of saved discovery documents.

returns.span: 檔案格式為序列化成 XML 的 類別；然而，您通常只會使用 方法或 Disco.exe 建立檔案。

span.span: The file format is a class serialized into XML; however, one would typically create the file using only the method or Disco.exe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以建立含有儲存的探索文件的對應檔案方法或 Disco.exe。A file containing a map of saved discovery documents can be created by the method or Disco.exe. `topLevelFilename`參數必須包含完整的路徑，如果檔案不存在目前目錄中。The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是 Web 表單，會填入之詳細文件和參考位於現有探索對應文件使用方法。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents and references found in an existing discovery map document using the method. [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ReadAll/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property References As DiscoveryClientReferenceCollection

summary.span: 參考的集合會在已解析的探索文件中找到。

span.span: A collection of references founds in resolved discovery documents.
A of references discovered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間叫用會填入集合， ，和方法。The collection is populated during invocations to the , , and methods. 在叫用期間和方法，如果所提供的 URL 是有效的探索文件，該文件會加入至探索文件中找到與參考的集合。During invocations to the and methods, if the supplied URL is a valid discovery document, that document is added to the collection together with references found in the discovery document. 叫用期間加入的參考和方法不一定是有效的探索文件。References added during invocations to the and methods are not necessarily valid discovery documents. 在叫用期間和內參考集合會驗證為有效的探索文件。During invocations to and references within the collection are verified as being valid discovery documents. 如果它們有效，而且包含參考，它們也會新增至集合。If they are valid and contain references, they are also added to the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是 Web 表單，會填入中參考的相關詳細資料XML Web 服務探索期間探索到的屬性。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the references in the property discovered during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填滿與在引動過程中找到參考。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the references found in an invocation to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.References#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.References/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.References#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.References/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveAll() cil managed

summary.span: 解析 屬性中對探索文件、XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 結構描述和服務描述的所有參考，以及在參考的探索文件中找到的參考。

span.span: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions in the property, as well as references found in referenced discovery documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有有效的解析參考它，會發現，並將它們中放置屬性。 resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the property. 同時和下載並驗證 XSD 結構描述和服務中的描述屬性。Both and download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the property. 不過，兩個方法是相同的探索文件的處理方式。However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents. 會在探索文件中的所有參考都解析屬性; 如果探索文件包含參考其他探索文件、都解析只探索文件。 resolves all references in discovery documents within the property; if a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, resolves just those discovery documents. 這些探索文件中找到的探索文件的巢狀層級的深度不會解決一個; 但是全部加以解析。Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ; whereas resolves them all. 解析巢狀的探索文件中的參考，直到有沒有更多的參考會繼續。 continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references. 在完成驗證程序期間發生的錯誤不擲回次出現項目，但而收集，並加入至屬性。Errors occurring during the verification process done by are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是 Web 表單，會填入中的文件的相關詳細資料屬性參考搭配 XML Web 服務探索期間找到每份文件。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填滿的結果與引動過程後面呼叫。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveAll/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResolveOneLevel() cil managed

summary.span: 解析 中對探索文件、XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 結構描述和服務描述的所有參考，以及在那些探索文件中找到的參考。

span.span: Resolves all references to discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions in , as well as references found in those discovery documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有有效的解析參考它，會發現，並將它們中放置屬性。 resolves all valid references it finds and places them in the property. 同時和下載並驗證 XSD 結構描述和服務中的描述屬性。Both and download and verify XSD schemas and service descriptions in the property. 不過，兩個方法是相同的探索文件的處理方式。However, the two methods differ in how they handle discovery documents. 會在探索文件中的所有參考都解析屬性。 resolves all references in discovery documents within the property. 如果探索文件包含參考其他探索文件、解析只探索文件。If a discovery document contains references to other discovery documents, resolves just those discovery documents. 這些探索文件中找到的探索文件的巢狀層級的深度不會解決一個; 但是解決所有問題。Discovery documents found in those discovery documents nested one level deep are not resolved by ; whereas resolve them all. 解析巢狀的探索文件中的參考，直到有沒有更多的參考會繼續。 continues to resolve references in nested discovery documents until there are no more references. 在完成驗證程序期間發生的錯誤不擲回次出現項目，但而收集，並加入至屬性。Errors occurring during the verification process done by are not thrown at the time of occurrence, but rather collected and added to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是 Web 表單，會填入中的文件的相關詳細資料屬性參考搭配 XML Web 服務探索期間找到每份文件。The following code example is a Web Form that populates a with the details about the documents in the property together with the references found in each document during an XML Web services discovery. `PopulateGrid`方法填滿的結果與引動過程後面呼叫。The `PopulateGrid` method fills the with the results from a invocation followed by a call to . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.ResolveOneLevel/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientResultCollection WriteAll(string directory, string topLevelFilename) cil managed
Public Function WriteAll (directory As String, topLevelFilename As String) As DiscoveryClientResultCollection

param.name: directory
param.span: 目錄，其中儲存所有目前在 屬性中的文件。

span.span: The directory in which to save all documents currently in the property.

param.name: topLevelFilename
param.span: 要建立或覆寫的檔案名稱，包含所有已儲存文件的對應。

span.span: The name of the file to create or overwrite containing a map of all documents saved.

summary.span: 將所有在 屬性中的探索文件、XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 結構描述和服務描述寫入提供的目錄，並在該目錄中建立檔案。

span.span: Writes all discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and Service Descriptions in the property to the supplied directory and creates a file in that directory.

returns.span: ，包含所有已儲存檔案的結果。

span.span: A containing the results of all files saved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的名稱建立檔案`topLevelFilename`目錄參數所指定的目錄中的參數包含儲存的探索文件、 XML 結構描述定義 (XSD) 結構描述和服務描述的對應。The file created with the name of the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the directory specified by the directory parameter contains a map of saved discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas and service descriptions. 可以讀取此檔案中使用方法來填入和屬性。This file can be read in using the method to populate the and properties. 檔案的格式為 XML 包含的序列化的版本類別。The format of the file is XML containing an serialized version of the class. 如果存在具有相同名稱的檔案`topLevelFilename`中的參數`directory`參數，該檔案覆寫方法。If a file exists with the same name as the `topLevelFilename` parameter in the `directory` parameter, that file is overwritten by the method. `topLevelFilename`參數必須包含完整的路徑，如果檔案不存在目前目錄中。The `topLevelFilename` parameter must include the fully qualified path if the file does not exist in the current directory. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將 Web 服務探索的結果寫入至磁碟，藉由叫用 Web Form方法之後呼叫和。The following code example is a Web Form that writes the results of a Web Services discovery to disk by invoking the method after calls to and . [!code-csharp[DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll/CS/discocs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll/VB/discovb.aspx#1)]
